     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       Music and the Civil Rights Movement &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>
    </div>

      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox20594245">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20594245">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20594245">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20594245">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
           IM (AIM, Yahoo): refcannon
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="http://bit.ly/spring2015student">
            A.T.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt20594245" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox20594246">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20594246">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20594246">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20594246">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article you're interested in, click on the
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           &nbsp;buttons&nbsp;found next to the citation, or run a journal title search in Trexler Library's
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank">
            Encompass Search.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt20594246" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox20594247">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20594247">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20594247">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reference works (good for generating topics and recommending sources)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20594247">
          <div id="boxatt20594247" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24023270">
              <a id="link_24023270" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24023270,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music and the Civil Rights Movement', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508858}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Hundreds of authoritative dictionaries, encyclopedias, fact books, guides, companions and more from respected publishers across dozens of major subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24024128">
              <a id="link_24024128" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/5BDB" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24024128,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music and the Civil Rights Movement', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24024128}); ">
               Encyclopedia of African-American Culture and History
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A five-volume set and supplement covering all aspects of the African-American experience from 1619 to the present day. Using biographies, historical essays, and thematic pieces, many written by foremost scholars, it addresses a wide array of subjects in over 2,300 articles to define in one source the cultural roots, participation in American life, and current condition of the African-American community.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24024121">
              <a id="link_24024121" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/3VGW" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24024121,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music and the Civil Rights Movement', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24024121}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Race and Racism
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Examines the anthropological, sociological, historical, economic, and scientific theories of race and racism in the modem era. Delves into the historic origins of ideas of race and racism and explores their social and scientific consequences. Includes biographies of significant theorists, as well as political and social leaders and notorious racists.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox20594248">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20594248">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20594248">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Primary documents via databases
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20594248">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt20594248" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24024092">
              <a id="link_24024092" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?authtype=ip,uid&amp;profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=31h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24024092,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music and the Civil Rights Movement', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329245}); ">
               America: History &amp; Life with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The definitive database of literature covering the history and culture of the United States and Canada, from prehistory to the present. With selective indexing for 1,700 journals from 1964 to present, this database is without question the most important bibliographic reference tool for students and scholars of U.S. and Canadian history. Full text journals include American Historical Review, American 19th Century History, American Studies, Early American Studies, Journal of American Culture, Journal of American History, Journal of Early American History, and Journal of Military History.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24024551">
              <a id="link_24024551" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://bsc.chadwyck.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24024551,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music and the Civil Rights Movement', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19275295}); ">
               Black Studies Center
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Historical and current material for researching the past, present and future of African-Americans, the wider African Diaspora, and Africa itself. Scholarly essays, recent periodicals, historical newspaper articles, a periodical index, and more, combined from several resources: Schomburg Studies on the Black Experience, International Index to Black Periodicals (IIBP), The Chicago Defender, and the Black Literature Index. The database is a rich source of full text peer-reviewed journals such as Africa Policy Journal, African American Review, African Arts, African Economic History, African Studies Quarterly, Africana, and scores of others.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24071484">
              <a id="link_24071484" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24071484,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music and the Civil Rights Movement', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24024084">
              <a id="link_24024084" href="http://www.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24024084,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music and the Civil Rights Movement', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24024084}); ">
               Google
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Steer toward sites that are associated with nonprofits, government, or educational institutions.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24025008">
              <a id="link_24025008" href="http://library.muhlenberg.edu/search/?searchtype=t&amp;SORT=D&amp;searcharg=new+york+times+online" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24025008,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music and the Civil Rights Movement', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20016926}); ">
               New York Times Index Online
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24024557">
              <a id="link_24024557" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=rgr" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24024557,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music and the Civil Rights Movement', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344565}); ">
               Reader's Guide Retrospective
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides indexing of general-interest periodicals published in the United States for the period 1890-1982.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox20652012">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20652012">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20652012">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Primary Document Websites
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20652012">
          <div id="boxatt20652012" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24095250">
              <a id="link_24095250" href="http://www.wisconsinhistory.org/Content.aspx?dsNav=N:1474" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24095250,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music and the Civil Rights Movement', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24095250}); ">
               1964 Freedom Summer Project
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Browse or search over 30,000 original documents from Freedom Summer, an effort by civil rights activists to integrate Mississippi's segregated political system.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24095090">
              <a id="link_24095090" href="http://www.thekingcenter.org/archive" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24095090,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music and the Civil Rights Movement', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24095090}); ">
               The Archive: The King Center
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               There are nearly a million documents at this website associated with the life of Martin Luther King Jr. These pages will present a more dynamic view than is often seen of Dr. King’s life and times. The documents reveal the scholar, the father, and the pastor. Through these papers we see the United States of America at one of its most vulnerable, most honest and perhaps most human moments in history.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24095081">
              <a id="link_24095081" href="http://blacklib1969.swarthmore.edu/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24095081,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music and the Civil Rights Movement', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24095081}); ">
               Black Liberation 1969 Archive
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The Black Liberation 1969 Archive chronicles the history of the black student protest movement at Swarthmore College by finally bringing forward the experiences of the students who organized and executed a series of nonviolent direct actions and negotiations at Swarthmore College. In honor of the College’s sesquicentennial, this archive challenges visitors to reconsider the stories that have previously constituted the official narrative and to engage with the black experience of Swarthmore in this critical period.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24095499">
              <a id="link_24095499" href="http://crdl.usg.edu/?Welcome" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24095499,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music and the Civil Rights Movement', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24095499}); ">
               Civil Rights Digital Library
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The struggle for racial equality in the 1950s and 1960s is among the most far-reaching social movements in the nation's history, and it represents a crucial step in the evolution of American democracy. The Civil Rights Digital Library promotes an enhanced understanding of the Movement by helping users discover primary sources and other educational materials from libraries, archives, museums, public broadcasters, and others on a national scale. The CRDL features a collection of unedited news film from the WSB (Atlanta) and WALB (Albany, Ga.) television archives held by the Walter J. Brown Media Archives and Peabody Awards Collection at the University of Georgia Libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24094711">
              <a id="link_24094711" href="http://northerncity.library.temple.edu/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24094711,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music and the Civil Rights Movement', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24094711}); ">
               Civil Rights in a Northern City: Philadelphia
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Civil Rights in a Northern City: Philadelphia is a collection of digitized archival resources detailing the history of the modern civil rights movement in Philadelphia.  Through a compelling range of photographs, newspapers, manuscripts, film footage, and oral histories, Civil Rights in a Northern City: Philadelphia seeks to highlight the key people, places, and events that made Philadelphia an important part of the national struggle for racial equality and social change. Temple University Libraries sponsors Civil Rights in a Northern City: Philadelphia and the text and materials presented here are primarily drawn from the holdings of its special collections.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24094567">
              <a id="link_24094567" href="http://www.crmvet.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24094567,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music and the Civil Rights Movement', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24094567}); ">
               Civil Rights Movement Veterans
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               This website is created by Veterans of the Southern Freedom Movement (1951-1968). With a few minor exceptions, everything on this site was written, created, or spoken by Movement activists who were direct participants in the events they chronicle.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24095269">
              <a id="link_24095269" href="http://digital.wustl.edu/eyesontheprize/index.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24095269,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music and the Civil Rights Movement', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24095269}); ">
               Eyes on the Prize Interviews
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Eyes on the Prize is a 14-part series which was originally released in two parts: Eyes I in 1985 and Eyes II in 1988. This series, which debuted on PBS stations, is considered to be the definitive documentary on the Civil Rights Movement. “Eyes on the Prize” won more than twenty major awards and attracted over 20 million viewers. These interviews are part of the Henry Hampton Collection housed at the Film and Media Archive at Washington University Libraries. Each transcript represented the entire interview conducted by Blackside including sections which appeared in the final program and the outtakes.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24095474">
              <a id="link_24095474" href="http://library.duke.edu/rubenstein/findingaids/sinsheimerjoseph/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24095474,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music and the Civil Rights Movement', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24095474}); ">
               Guide to the Joseph A. Sinsheimer Papers, 1962-1987
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Joseph A. Sinsheimer graduated from Duke University in 1987 with an A.B. in History. He recorded oral histories of the Mississippi civil rights movement between 1983 and 1987, with grant support from the Lyndhurst Foundation. Collection includes audio recordings and transcripts of oral history interviews and speeches regarding the Student Nonviolent Coordinating Committee in Mississippi in the 1960s, with brief summaries. Focus is on the "Freedom Summer" of 1964. Notable interviews include Robert Parris Moses, Sam Block, Hazel Palmer, Jesse Jackson, Gray Evans, Frank Smith, and many more. Collection also contains a small amount of manuscript materials from the civil rights era, including clippings, reports, scrapbooks, and correspondence.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24095214">
              <a id="link_24095214" href="http://www.columbia.edu/cu/ccbh/mxp/index.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24095214,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music and the Civil Rights Movement', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24095214}); ">
               The Malcolm X Project at Columbia University
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               This site is organized into two sections. The Life of Malcolm X takes you on a chronological journey through Malcolm's life, featuring readings, analysis and multimedia concerning each period of his life. Malcolm Multimedia is a comprehensive collection of digital media about Malcolm X, featuring video interviews with people who knew Malcolm, government documents and archival footage.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24095522">
              <a id="link_24095522" href="http://scalar.usc.edu/nehvectors/nicest-kids/index" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24095522,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music and the Civil Rights Movement', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24095522}); ">
               The Nicest Kids in Town
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               View over 100 images and video clips related to a University of California press book project on racial discrimination by the television show American Bandstand, including American Bandstand memorabilia, newspaper clippings regarding protests of American Bandstand, photographs from high school yearbooks, and video clips from American Bandstand.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24095501">
              <a id="link_24095501" href="http://sohp.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24095501,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music and the Civil Rights Movement', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24095501}); ">
               Southern Oral History Program
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Since 1973, the Southern Oral History Program has worked to preserve the voices of the southern past. We have collected more than 5,000 interviews with people from all walks of life—from mill workers to civil rights leaders to future presidents of the United States. Made available through UNC’s renowned Southern Historical Collection online, these interviews capture the vivid personalities, poignant personal stories, and behind-the-scenes decision-making that bring history to life.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24095455">
              <a id="link_24095455" href="http://mdah.state.ms.us/arrec/digital_archives/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24095455,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music and the Civil Rights Movement', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24095455}); ">
               Sovereignty Commission Online
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The Mississippi State Sovereignty Commission was the state's official counter civil rights agency from 1956–1973. The files in this online collection comprise the scanned originals with court-approved redactions requested by individuals named in the records along with additional information submitted by individuals named in the records who chose to file a rebuttal. The collection also includes the court-specified personal name index and links between rebuttal records and Commission records in which rebuttal submitters are mentioned. The files may be searched by personal name, folder title and number, or rebuttal respondent.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24095506">
              <a id="link_24095506" href="http://www.jsums.edu/hamerinstitute/resources/flhspeeches/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24095506,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music and the Civil Rights Movement', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24095506}); ">
               A Voice That Could Stir an Army: Fannie Lou Hamer and the Rhetoric of the Black Freedom Movement
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Video and text of speeches by Civil Rights activist Fannie Lou Hamer.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox20594249">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20594249">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20594249">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Authoritative secondary commentary in books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20594249">
          <div id="boxatt20594249" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24023273">
              <a id="link_24023273" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24023273,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music and the Civil Rights Movement', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24024151">
              <a id="link_24024151" href="http://books.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24024151,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music and the Civil Rights Movement', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19995864}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Many authors have placed their works in Google Books as a way to increase exposure and hopefully sell more copies of their works.  Any full text that appears may not be easy to extract or manipulate, and often only snippets are available for viewing online. Use the "Find in a Library" option to "request item" on interlibrary loan (you need to be "connected to the Muhlenberg Col Libr network" to do so).
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox20594250">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20594250">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20594250">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Authoritative secondary commentary in articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20594250">
          <div id="boxatt20594250" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24024538">
              <a id="link_24024538" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24024538,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music and the Civil Rights Movement', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343584}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text access to scholarly and non-scholarly publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24024099">
              <a id="link_24024099" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?authtype=ip,uid&amp;profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=31h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24024099,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music and the Civil Rights Movement', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329245}); ">
               America: History &amp; Life with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The definitive database of literature covering the history and culture of the United States and Canada, from prehistory to the present. With selective indexing for 1,700 journals from 1964 to present, this database is without question the most important bibliographic reference tool for students and scholars of U.S. and Canadian history. Full text journals include American Historical Review, American 19th Century History, American Studies, Early American Studies, Journal of American Culture, Journal of American History, Journal of Early American History, and Journal of Military History.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24024546">
              <a id="link_24024546" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://bsc.chadwyck.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24024546,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music and the Civil Rights Movement', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19275295}); ">
               Black Studies Center
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Historical and current material for researching the past, present and future of African-Americans, the wider African Diaspora, and Africa itself. Scholarly essays, recent periodicals, historical newspaper articles, a periodical index, and more, combined from several resources: Schomburg Studies on the Black Experience, International Index to Black Periodicals (IIBP), The Chicago Defender, and the Black Literature Index. The database is a rich source of full text peer-reviewed journals such as Africa Policy Journal, African American Review, African Arts, African Economic History, African Studies Quarterly, Africana, and scores of others.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24023276">
              <a id="link_24023276" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24023276,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music and the Civil Rights Movement', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286586}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Library subscription databse. Archive of the full text of numerous history journals from major academic presses.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24024100">
              <a id="link_24024100" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24024100,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music and the Civil Rights Movement', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974037}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               May be used in conjunction with interlibrary loan. Access to full text is maximized by searching from the Muhlenberg network.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24024544">
              <a id="link_24024544" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=rih" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24024544,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music and the Civil Rights Movement', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12726054}); ">
               RILM Abstract of Music Literature
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Index to scholarly and popular literature in musicology, ethnomusicology, dance, and other music-related disciplines. Links to full text.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile5497411" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox20594252">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20594252">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20594252">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing sources in Chicago style (foot/endnotes and bibliography format)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20594252">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            <em>
             Citation Guides for Print and Electronic Resources
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           Or visit the
           <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/resource/717/01/">
            <em>
             Online Writing Lab
            </em>
           </a>
           at Purdue.
          </p>
          <p>
           The full text of the Chicago Manual of Style, 16th ed. is available to Muhlenberg College students
           <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=Http://www.chicagomanualofstyle.org/16/contents.html">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            <em>
             Zotero
            </em>
           </a>
           . Here is a
           <a href="https://www.zotero.org/support/">
            user guide
           </a>
           to Zotero. NOTE: In order to construct footnotes (as opposed to bibliography), the
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/support/word_processor_plugin_installation_for_zotero_2.1">
            MS Word Plug-In
           </a>
           is needed.
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Help with annotated bibliographies
          </p>
          <blockquote>
           <p>
            Visit Purdue's
            <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/handouts/">
             <em>
              Online Writing Lab
             </em>
            </a>
            for definitions and
            <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/resource/614/03/">
             format
            </a>
            of an annotation.
           </p>
          </blockquote>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt20594252" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox20594253">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20594253">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20594253">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20594253">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt20594253" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
